ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('The value cannot be less than min. value')
MlsTrans('The field is required to fill')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select S1.CONDITION, S2.CONDITION, S1.DESCRIPTION, S1.GCM_NUM, S1.GCM_NOTE4, S1.GCM_NOTE5, S2.DESCRIPTION, S2.GCM_NUM, S2.GCM_NOTE4 from SYS_GCM S1 left join SYS_GCM S2 on S1.GCM_ID = S2.CONDITION where S1.CONDITION = 'COMCLASS' :1

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,10}='' OR ISNULL({0,10}),'',' AND S1.DESCRIPTION LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,10})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39)&' ')
